name: Portobello BEAT
description:
Portobello BEAT is a rhythm boxing game where you play as Shiitake, a young mushroom boxer that must dodge and punch to the rhythm of the song in order to beat Deathcap, the reigning mushroom boxing champion. 

Controls:

SPACEBAR: PUNCH

DOWN KEY: DODGE

Q: PAUSE

This game was made by Eric Zhang (programming) and Miguel Gonçalves(Art) , 2 Bournemouth University students as their 3rd year final project. with additional help by Phillip Harker (concept art) and Jack Murphy (character art) it is a simple short game inspiredby Rhythm Heaven and Punch out!
